amendatorysection.catchline: Commission on Public Advocacy; applications; board; recommendations; certification of recipients.
amendatorysection.para: The Commission on Public Advocacy shall accept applications for loan forgiveness on an annual basis from qualified persons and shall present those applications to the board for its consideration. The board shall make recommendations for loans to the commission, and the commission shall certify the eligible recipients and the loan amount per recipient. The loans awarded to the recipients shall come from funds appropriated by the Legislature and any other funds that may be available from the Legal Education for Public Service Loan Repayment Fund.
